sentences.sContent: Interference with the normal production of heme or globin leads to anemia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Interference with the normal production of heme or globin leads to anemia.
sentences.sCn: 血红素或球蛋白的正常产生收到干扰会导致贫血。

sentences.sContent: Perhaps the present concern with the values of liberal arts education portends an intellectual anemia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Perhaps the present concern with the values of liberal arts education portends an intellectual anemia.
sentences.sCn: 现在关心大学文科教育的重要性也许意味着患了智力贫血症。
